mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet (user_id, pet_name, pet_category, pet_image, pet_icon, pet_back_color) VALUES (#{userId}, #{petName}, #{petCategory}, #{petImage}, #{petIcon}, #{petBackColor})
mapper.select: SELECT pet_id AS petId, pet_name AS petName FROM pet WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT pet_id AS petId, pet_name AS petName, pet_category AS petCategory , pet_image AS petImage, pet_icon AS petIcon, pet_back_color AS petBackColor , created_at AS createdAt FROM pet WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE pet SET pet_name = #{petName}, pet_category = #{petCategory}, pet_image = #{petImage}, pet_icon = #{petIcon}, pet_back_color = #{petBackColor} WHERE pet_id = #{petId}
